And it's not just about the actual work - it's about the whole lifestyle thing too. They're always posting about their fancy coffee shops and trendy neighborhoods, while I'm over here working from home in my sweatpants. It's just so...uninspiring. I feel like I'll never be able to compete with these girls, no matter how hard I try.

I guess what really gets me is when they start talking about their "passion projects" and how they're "pursuing their dreams". Meanwhile, I'm just trying to pay my rent on time. It's like, where's the passion in that? Where's the drive? I feel like I'm just going through the motions, while they're out there changing the world.

It's just so frustrating, because I know I'm capable of so much more. But every time I look at their feeds, I just feel like giving up. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole design thing after all.
